body:
So, we've decided to make a thread, dedicated to interviewing members! Made so we don't spam the forums with individual interviews :P
(made for the whole community, so the community is represented, not just my friends :P)
Question #1:
Have you guys been experiencing server lag lately?
Describe if you have(how severe it is) please actually comment "no" if you haven't.
Poll!

Question #2:
What do YOU feel about the map devs retiring. :,c
more may come later........
Question #3:

title: ♣The Avicadian Gazette♣>Interview01

replies.body:
Answer to 1:

Severe. Just severe.

Answer to 2:

I feel like we need more.

Pretty self explanatory questions.

Question #1: 
Have you guys been experiencing server lag lately? Yes
Describe if you have(how severe it is) please actually comment "no" if you haven't. Serve, just Serve.
Question #2:
What do YOU feel about the map devs retiring. :,c The community doesn't deserve their amazing work.

There's already enough gossip as is.

replies.body:
But emerald.. What happened to your staff rank??? D: 

i jk.

1. Severe time outs that ruin the games as I can never finish a match.
2. I like this new staff shakeup thing going on to be honest. More staff are needed though to replace the ones getting the axe.
